    • Method Detail

      • registerForGdxInstantiation

        public static void registerForGdxInstantiation(java.lang.Class<?>... classes)

        libGDX has quite heavy reflection usage, includes all collection classes. So if a class was used in any collection-related libGDX feature, e.g. JSON serialization, you should register it with this method.

        This method equal as GdxFeatureUtils#registerForAnyInstantiation(false, Class...)

        Parameters:
        classes - the classes will be registered
        See Also:
        registerForAnyInstantiation(boolean, Class...)

      • registerForAnyInstantiation

        public static void registerForAnyInstantiation(boolean registerConstructorsParams,
                                               java.lang.Class<?>... classes)

        Register for class instantiation recursively, with all subclasses and fields' classes, optional with: all constructors' parameters' classes.

        NOTE this method not for serialization.

        Parameters:
        registerConstructorsParams - whether with all constructors' classes
        classes - the classes will be registered
        See Also:
        RuntimeReflection.register(Field...), RuntimeReflection.register(Class...), RuntimeReflection.register(Executable...)
